GameApplet - Class in petri.api
The class that takes Applet input and distributes it to GameEngine and current GameMode.
GameApplet(boolean) - Constructor for class petri.api.GameApplet
Creates a new game applet.
GameApplet.CloseHook - Class in petri.api
A thread used to close the game correctly.
GameApplet.CloseHook(GameApplet) - Constructor for class petri.api.GameApplet.CloseHook
 
GameEngine - Class in petri.api
Handles all the game logic and painting based on the current game mode.
GameEngine(boolean) - Constructor for class petri.api.GameEngine
Creates a new GameEngine.
GameImage - Class in petri.api
The base class for all Images used in the game.
GameImage() - Constructor for class petri.api.GameImage
 
GameImage(String) - Constructor for class petri.api.GameImage
Loads a new Image, and generates an outline.
GameImage(String, String) - Constructor for class petri.api.GameImage
Loads a new Image at path p, and generates an outline.
GameInitializer - Class in petri.api
Starts the game and displays the Applet.
GameInitializer(String, boolean) - Constructor for class petri.api.GameInitializer
